ArgumentString.Name: JOB_ARGS
ArgumentString.Description: Pass specific arguments to the Job Script.

ArgumentFileName.Name: INPUT_FILE
ArgumentFileName.Description: A standalone input file or ZIP archive. This option supports the automatic detection of master, starter and engine files.

ArgumentFileNameMulti.Name: INCLUDE_FILES
ArgumentFileNameMulti.Description: Files to be included with the Job Script.

ArgumentDirectoryName.Name: SUBMISSION_DIRECTORY
ArgumentDirectoryName.Description: Where your job files will initially be staged, and results will be returned upon job completion.

ArgumentBooleanWithDescription.Name: ENABLE_LOGGING
ArgumentBooleanWithDescription.Description: Enable logging. Useful for development and debugging.

ArgumentBooleanWithDescription.Name: COMPRESS_RESULTS
ArgumentBooleanWithDescription.Description: Compress job results into a single ZIP file.
